articles.description: The coronavirus pandemic has brought countries to a standstill. Meanwhile, vaccinations have already started in some countries as cases continue to rise. Follow here for the latest.
articles.content:
Some states could fully vaccinate their 65-and-older population within two months, but it could take more than twice as long for others, a CNN analysis found.

articles.title: Pentagon May Send Troops to Assist With Vaccines, Enlarging Federal Role - msnNOW
